project_plan.name: Weather Information Fetcher in Python
project_plan.description: Create a Python program that retrieves and displays current weather information for a specified city using a public API.

task.name: Implement API integration to fetch weather data
Parse and extract temperature, humidity, and weather conditions from the API response
Display the fetched weather information in the terminal
Write tests for the API integration and data parsing functionality
Execute tests to verify the functionality of the implemented features
